          <title>
            <string language="sl">Žiroskop</string>
            <string language="en">Gyroscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gyroskop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gyroscope</string>

          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev delovanja žiroskopa s pomočjo vrtečega in stacionarnega kolesa.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of basic principle of gyroscope build of spinning and stationary wheel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">žiroskop</string>
            <string language="en">gyroscope</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">vrteče kolo</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration des Grundprinzips des Gyroskopbaus 
von Spinnen und von stationärem Rad.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de principe de base de la 
construction de gyroscope de la rotation et de la roue stationnaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração do princípio básico da 
configuração do gyroscope de girar e de roda estacionária.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione del principio di base di 
configurazione del giroscopio di filatura e della rotella stazionaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της βασικής αρχής της κατασκευής γυροσκοπίων
της περιστροφής και της στάσιμης ρόδας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración del principio de base de la 
estructura del giroscopio de hacer girar y de la rueda inmóvil.</string>
          </description>
